articles.author: Vinayakk Mohanarangan
articles.title: Asian Champions Trophy: Captain Savita Punia steps up as India emerge champions after near-perfect week with 4-0 win against Japan - The Indian Express
articles.description: Sangita Kumari (17'), Neha (46'), Lalremsiami (57') and Vandana Katariya (60') were the scorers as India finished their assignment in Ranchi with seven wins in seven matches
articles.content: Savita Punia did not have much to do in the early part of the Asian Champions Trophy in Ranchi. It would not be an exaggeration to say she had to work harder in the pre-tournament press conference wh… [+4605 chars]
